articles.title: Oil's Dramatic Open Leaves Traders Puzzled After WTI Crashes - Bloomberg
articles.description: After a wave of selling over the last week it was little surprise when US crude futures opened lower on Thursday, but few traders were braced for the 7.2% plunge that unfolded in the first dramatic minutes of trading.
